data.name: Spartan Fist Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The ideal soundtrack to listen to when punching dudes so hard they explode.

On purchase, this complete track list will be in your game's install directory, in the OST sub-folder:
  • 1. All That Glitters No Melody
  • 2. All That Glitters
  • 3. All That Glitters Boss Fight
  • 4. Face Punch
  • 5. Face Punch Ultra
  • 6. Fight Night Popcorn No Melody
  • 7. Fight Night Popcorn
  • 8. Fight Night Popcorn Boss Fight
  • 9. Lava is Just Rocks with Attitude No Melody
  • 10. Lava is Just Rocks with Attitude
  • 11. Lava is Just Rocks with Attitude Boss Fight
  • 12. Pigeon Paradise No Melody
  • 13. Pigeon Paradise
  • 14. Pigeon Paradise Boss Fight
  • 15. Pigeon Paradise Vocal Version FOR CD
  • 16. The Underground's Gonna Pound No Melody
  • 17. The Underground's Gonna Pound
  • 18. The Underground's Gonna Pound Boss Fight
  • 19. The Ending isn't the Ending
